des: "I love this dressing, it's zesty and mellow at the same time.  It's perfect on a big, tossed green salad, and is great as a marinade for veggies, meat, or fish. I usually double or triple the batch to always have some around."
ins: Whisk together the rice vinegar, red wine vinegar, honey, sesame oil, rosemary, basil, marjoram, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl until evenly combined. Whisk in the vegetable oil, then pour into a vinaigrette shaker; refrigerate overnight before using to blend the flavors. Shake to mix before pouring.
